title: Swiss Typography ID's
content:
Hello,  
I am looking for a couple display typefaces, I believe they're Swiss...  
Here are some images :  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [25414.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/typophile.com/files/25414.jpg) | 139.18 KB |
| [25411.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/typophile.com/files/25411.jpg) | 37.33 KB |
| [647.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/typophile.com/files/647.jpg) | 128.02 KB |
| [25411-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/typophile.com/files/25411-1.jpg) | 104.06 KB |
| [Screen Shot 2013-02-08 at 11.00.57 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-08%20at%2011.00.57%20AM.png) | 379.34 KB |
author: MRE

comments.content:
"ZUERICH/GENF/BASEL...": [Rational SR Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/bench.li/images/648) by [League](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/www.league.ch/)

"AMMANN SIEBRECHT"  
- woodmark: the closest I have is [Plak Extra Condensed Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/plak_com_complete_pack/) (mainly /S off)  
- body text: [Aperçu](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/apercu/about-font) (custom version of Aperçu called "Aperçu-ASBold" on website)

JORMA MUELLER PHOTOGRAPHY  
Identity by [Bureau Colective](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/www.bureaucollective.ch/#!/project/44/1), typeface most probably custom.
Thanks, I was looking more for the Amman Siebrecht Logotype condensed typeface

I've just edited my previous post.

LOVESTREAM  
Also by [Bureau Collective](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/www.bureaucollective.ch/#!/project/39/1)

EDIT  
JORMA MUELLER PHOTOGRAPHY: most probably [URW++ Signal](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627144648/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T1052/signal) (1D)
Ah great call on Plak, the S is probably custom as the original isn't very nice anyway. :)
